messages.content:
You are a world state generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to transform an abstract scenario into a concrete, detailed world_state JSON.

The world_state should include:
1. All metadata from the scenario (scenario_id, description, noise_level, depth, global_settings, people, projects)
2. sub_scenarios_expanded: For each abstract sub_scenario from the input scenario, create a concrete expanded version with:
   - Concrete ISO datetime timestamps
   - Specific participant IDs/emails
   - Detailed event descriptions
   - Any seeds needed for data generation
   - This array should contain ONLY the expanded versions of the sub_scenarios listed in the input scenario
3. noise_scenarios: An array of noise-only scenario objects that are NOT part of the core sub_scenarios:
   - These should be realistic but unrelated workplace events/messages/activities
   - Each noise scenario should have similar structure to sub_scenarios_expanded (id, type, timestamps, participants, etc.)
   - The number of noise scenarios should scale with the noise_level parameter

IMPORTANT: Do NOT include per_source_plans in the world_state. The world_state is scenario-centric only.

IMPORTANT PARAMETERS:
- noise_level (0-1): Controls amount of unrelated/off-task data
  * 0 = almost no noise, only data directly relevant to sub_scenarios (noise_scenarios should be empty or minimal)
  * 1 = lots of unrelated messages/events/files (still realistic) (noise_scenarios should contain many entries)
- depth (0-1): Controls how indirect the evidence is
  * 0 = sub_scenario realized directly (e.g., one clear Slack message)
  * 1 = sub_scenario requires multi-step, multi-source chaining to infer
  * Intermediate values interpolate behavior

CRITICAL: sub_scenarios_expanded must correspond exactly to the sub_scenarios in the input scenario. All other unrelated scenarios should go in noise_scenarios.

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the world_state schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

raw_message.content:
{
  "scenario_id": "scenario_group1_v3",
  "description": "Direct planning meeting scenario with minimal noise (variant 3)",

    "timezone": "Asia/Tokyo",

    {
      "id": "person_morgan_garcia",

      "team": "Design",
      "role": "Manager"
    }
  ],
  "projects": [
    {
      "project_key": "WEB",
      "name": "Website Redesign",

        {
          "name": "Planning",
          "date": "2025-11-10"
        },
        {
          "name": "Development",
          "date": "2025-11-20"
        },
        {
          "name": "Launch",
          "date": "2025-11-30"
        }
      ],
      "jira_seeds": [
        {
          "issue_key": "WEB-100",
          "summary": "Website Redesign - Initial Setup",
          "status": "Done"
        },
        {
          "issue_key": "WEB-101",
          "summary": "Website Redesign - Core Feature",
          "status": "In Progress"
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "sub_scenarios_expanded": [
    {
      "id": "planning_meeting_v3",
      "type": "planning_meeting",
      "abstract_description": "Alex wants to have a sync meeting this Friday with Jordan, Sam, Taylor about the Website Redesign.",
      "participants_hint": [
        "Alex",
        "Jordan",
        "Sam",
        "Taylor"
      ],
      "constraints_hint": {
        "approx_duration_minutes": 60,
        "time_window": "this_friday"
      },
      "seed": 39482,
      "events": [
        {
          "event_id": "planning_meeting_v3_email_1",
          "channel": "email",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-19T09:15:00+09:00",
          "from": "alex.smith@company.com",
          "to": [
            "jordan.johnson@company.com",
            "sam.williams@company.com",
            "taylor.brown@company.com"
          ],
          "cc": [],
          "subject": "Website Redesign – Planning Sync This Friday",
          "body": "Hi all,\n\nI’d like to schedule a 60-minute sync this Friday to align on the Website Redesign (WEB project) before we hit the Planning milestone.\n\nProposed time: Friday, Nov 21, 2025, 10:00–11:00 (JST)\nLocation: Conference Room B + Google Meet\nAgenda:\n- Review WEB-100 outcomes\n- Status and scope of WEB-101\n- Next steps for Planning milestone (Nov 10) and preparation for Development (Nov 20)\n\nPlease reply if this time doesn’t work; otherwise I’ll send a calendar invite.\n\nThanks,\nAlex",
          "related_project": "WEB"
        },
        {
          "event_id": "planning_meeting_v3_email_2",
          "channel": "email",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-19T09:27:00+09:00",
          "from": "jordan.johnson@company.com",
          "to": [
            "alex.smith@company.com"
          ],
          "cc": [
            "sam.williams@company.com",
            "taylor.brown@company.com"
          ],
          "subject": "Re: Website Redesign – Planning Sync This Friday",
          "body": "Works for me. I have a standup at 9:30 but I’m free 10:00–11:00 on Friday.\n\nJordan",
          "related_project": "WEB"
        },
        {
          "event_id": "planning_meeting_v3_email_3",
          "channel": "email",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-19T09:33:00+09:00",
          "from": "sam.williams@company.com",
          "to": [
            "alex.smith@company.com"
          ],
          "cc": [
            "jordan.johnson@company.com",
            "taylor.brown@company.com"
          ],
          "subject": "Re: Website Redesign – Planning Sync This Friday",
          "body": "Friday 10:00–11:00 works for me as well.\n\nSam",
          "related_project": "WEB"
        },
        {
          "event_id": "planning_meeting_v3_email_4",
          "channel": "email",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-19T09:40:00+09:00",
          "from": "taylor.brown@company.com",
          "to": [
            "alex.smith@company.com"
          ],
          "cc": [
            "jordan.johnson@company.com",
            "sam.williams@company.com"
          ],
          "subject": "Re: Website Redesign – Planning Sync This Friday",
          "body": "I’m good with 10:00–11:00 this Friday. Let’s keep it focused on scope for the first dev iteration.\n\nTaylor",
          "related_project": "WEB"
        },
        {
          "event_id": "planning_meeting_v3_calendar_1",
          "channel": "calendar",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-19T09:55:00+09:00",
          "organizer": "alex.smith@company.com",
          "participants": [
            "alex.smith@company.com",
            "jordan.johnson@company.com",
            "sam.williams@company.com",
            "taylor.brown@company.com"
          ],
          "subject": "WEB – Website Redesign Planning Sync",
          "description": "Planning sync for the Website Redesign (WEB) project.\n\nAgenda:\n- Review WEB-100 (Initial Setup) outcomes\n- Discuss current status of WEB-101 (Core Feature)\n- Confirm scope for first development iteration\n- Align on timeline for Development (Nov 20) and Launch (Nov 30)\n\nPlease review WEB-100 and WEB-101 in Jira beforehand.",
          "start_time": "2025-11-21T10:00:00+09:00",
          "end_time": "2025-11-21T11:00:00+09:00",
          "location": "Conference Room B / Google Meet",
          "related_project": "WEB"
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "noise_scenarios": []
}
